data.title: APA Formatting and Style Guide
data.meta_description: APA Formatting - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document provides an overview of APA style guidelines for formatting papers, in-text citations, and references. It discusses the basics of in-text citations, including providing the author's name and date for both direct quotes and paraphrases. It also reviews how to format citations for different numbers of authors and how to handle citations for different source types like personal communications.
